title: Who wore it best? Strictly Come Dancing, Movie Week: the costumier's verdict
text:
Scottish Ballet’s senior wardrobe technician Ciara Nolan gives her verdict on the third week’s costumes

This was the week I had been looking forward to more than any other, as our 14 remaining couples performed in Strictly’s annual Movie Week! At Scottish Ballet, we are used to creating costume based on a character, reflecting the personality and transforming a dancer into their role.

I think Dev and Dianne dancing to Aladdin stood out for all the right reasons. Dev looked great as the genie, mostly thanks to the make-up and wigs department. Dianne, meanwhile, wore an adorable mini monkey tutu, made from gathered brown and red tulle. The “fur” was actually meters and meters of thin ribbon,...
description: Scottish Ballet’s senior wardrobe technician Ciara Nolan gives her verdict on the third week’s costumes
